reviewText: The previous reviews are for a different video. This video has a cajun quartet, a fife and drum band, Son house, Skip James, and Bukka White only. All of the performances are good, with son house the standout.
I really enjoyed this video,especially the performances of Willie Foster, Boogaloo, T-model Ford. In this Video you get a true picture of  a real jook joint and blues legends as they perform.

The video does an excellent job of telling the story of the roots of Blues music - from the son of a field hand - whose mother was forced to pick cotton the day he was born - to the uplifting role Gospel music plays in  bringing the soul of music and musician to life.
Best one hour music  video you could own.
